name: Octopus's breakout
description:
http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=preview&uid=30779

Game made for LD37.

Theme : One Room

You're a captive octopus in a dangerous room. You'll have to take advantage of the teleporters to disable traps and try to make your way out. As you progress, the room becomes more dangerous.
